ai.question: A network administrator is troubleshooting connectivity issues with a router and finds that the S0/0/0 interface IP address has been improperly configured. At what layer of the OSI model is this problem occurring?

choice.text: Layer 1
Layer 3
Layer 4
Layer 7

form-item.ai: host to switchhub to switchrouter to switchrouters Fa0/0 to hosthub to routerswitch to switch Straight-through CableCrossover Cable Drag the pairs of devices on the left to the UTP cable type that connects them on the right.123456no titleno description given1352461Straight-through=host to switch, router to switch, switch to host Crossover=hub to switch, routers Fa0/0 to host, switch to switch

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. A network administrator is troubleshooting the connectivity between the headquarters and the branch office. Which important troubleshooting information can the administrator get from the output of the show interface serial 0/0/0 command?

choice.text: encapsulation type
CSU/DSU type
CSU/DSU timing
routing protocol type

ai.question: Which interface status indicates a high error rate?

choice.text: Serial 0/0/0 is down, line protocol is down.
Serial 0/0/0 is up, line protocol is down.
Serial 0/0/0 is up, line protocol is down (looped).
Serial 0/0/0 is up, line protocol is down (disabled).
Serial 0/0/0 is administratively down, line protocol is down.

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. Hosts on the LAN are able to communicate with hosts on the same LAN, but are unable to connect outside the network. What is the possible problem?

choice.text: The pool command is not applied to an interface.
The DNS address is misconfigured.
The DHCP address is missing.
The default gateway address is on a different network.

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. What can be concluded from the output of the debug ip rip command? (Choose two.)

choice.text: The 10.0.0.0 network is two hops from R1.
A ping to 192.168.168.10 will be successful.
R1 sent information about five destinations in the update.
R1 sent a RIP broadcast on Fa0/0 that advertises two networks.
R1 has received updates from one router at source address 10.0.15.2.

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. What is the result of the command that is issued on R1?

choice.text: The 192.168.1.0 network will not receive any DHCP requests.
DHCP acknowledgments will be issued from the 192.168.1.0 network.
Switch SW2 is acting as a DHCP relay agent for the 192.168.1.0 network.
DHCP requests are forwarded to 192.168.2.3.

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. Based on the results from the troubleshooting commands, what is one possible problem?

choice.text: An incorrect IP address was assigned.
The packets may be blocked by a firewall.
The routing protocol was not configured correctly.
There is a Layer 2 encapsulation error.
